sentences.sCn: 警官们担心不公平的比较。

synos.tran: 诽谤的；不公平的；引起反感的；易招嫉妒的

remMethod.val: in(不) + vid(看) + ious → 不看的 → 惹人反感的

trans.tranCn: 易招嫉妒的, 不公平的, 诽谤的
trans.tranOther: An invidious comparison or choice between two things is an unfair one because the two things are very different or are equally good or bad
